games.title: Barry Prison: Parkour Escape!
games.description: Join the exhilarating adventure of Barry Prison: Parkour Escape! Navigate complex parkour obstacles, outsmart Warden Barry, and gather items like coins and jetpacks to execute your escape. Play for free on your phone or computer and prove your skills in this ultimate test of freedom!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:

💻Computer:
Mouse - camera rotation
WASD - movement
Space - jump
Enter - use items
Shift - jetpack
Tab - menu

📱 Mobile device:
Use the interface buttons on the screen

games.title: Escape From Squid Island
games.description: Dive into this thrilling 3D shooter, "Escape from Squid Island," where you must flee a dangerous island filled with enemies. Enjoy intense battles, varied environments, and an engaging plot on your device. Prepare for an exhilarating experience as you fight for your freedom!
games.howToPlayText:
- Use WASD to control your character
- Rotate the mouse to control the camera
- Click the left mouse button to shoot
- Click the right mouse button to aim
- Press R to recharge

games.title: Abandoned Mansion
games.description:
Abandoned Mansion is a first-person horror game set in an abandoned mansion, where a distress call leads you to investigate. Upon arrival, you realize it’s too late.
The game features item interaction, challenging puzzles, and terrifying monsters.

Features:

Optimized 3D graphics and realistic sound effects
Immersive and thrilling music
Multiple levels to test your skills
Variety of enemy types
Boss fights
Puzzles to solve
Exploration of the abandoned building
Hidden rooms and items
"Abandoned Mansion" will test your courage and survival skills. Can you unravel the mansion's mystery and face its monstrous inhabitants? Play now to find out.
games.howToPlayText:
W, A, S, D - Move
E - Interact
R - Reload
C - Crouch
Tab - Open inventory
Space - Jump
Left mouse button - Attack/Shoot

games.title: Stickman Escape - Plane and Ship
games.description:
Prove to everyone that you are a rich man! Only those players who have money can make a purchase in this game. The continuation of the game about escaping from the ship is paid.
In this game you need to find all the successful options for escaping from the plane and the ship. You will face difficulties on the way, enemies, a choice of items, a choice of actions and monsters. You will play as the character Stick.
games.howToPlayText:
Find all the successful ways to escape from the plane and ship.
Use your computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or your finger.

games.title: Escape Strange Girl’s House
games.description:
Escape Strange Girl’s House is a dark point-and-click adventure available on both web and Android.

You wake up in a locked, unfamiliar house. The windows are sealed, the doors are bolted, and it doesn’t take long to realize you’re not here by choice — you’ve been kidnapped. The only way forward is to explore, uncover clues, and piece together who lives here… and why they’ve trapped you.

Every object can hide a secret: a sofa may conceal something beneath its cushions, a flowerpot may hold a key, or a book on the shelf may reveal disturbing truths about the strange girl who owns this place. Interacting with the environment unlocks new paths, changes the protagonist’s perception, and pushes the story into darker territory.

As in every classic point-and-click adventure, you’ll collect items and use them in clever ways to solve puzzles, repair devices, and access new rooms. A simple glass of water, a sharp knife, or a roll of tape could be the difference between staying trapped forever and finding your way to freedom.

The narrative unfolds gradually, shifting from calm exploration to mounting dread. What begins as a harmless search of a living room turns into a chilling discovery of obsessions, sinister secrets, and unsettling mannequins that seem far too lifelike.

Your ultimate goal is clear: escape the house before it’s too late. But as you progress, you’ll uncover more about the girl’s twisted hobbies — and the terrifying fate that might await you if you fail.

Will you outsmart her and unlock the final door to freedom, or become just another part of her dark collection?
games.howToPlayText: Explore the house by tapping on objects, collect useful items, combine them to solve puzzles, and uncover secrets that lead you closer to escaping.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/escape-strange-girls-house?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Locked in Grandma’s Basement 2: Revenge - Horror Escape
games.description:
Locked in Grandma’s Basement 2: Revenge – Horror Escape is the chilling sequel to the cult classic point-and-click horror game.
After managing to escape once, Grandma has found you again — and this time, she’s locked you in an even darker, more twisted place.
Explore eerie rooms, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover cursed objects and grotesque clues.
Use your logic and courage to find tools, unlock hidden paths, and perform a disturbing ritual to escape.
Every item has a purpose, every detail tells a story — and Grandma is always watching.
Will you manage to escape again, or will you become her next ritual offering?
Perfect for fans of horror, escape rooms, and point-and-click adventures.
games.howToPlayText:
This is a classic point-and-click adventure with a first-person view.
You don’t move around freely — instead, you explore each scene from a fixed perspective.
Click on objects to examine them, collect useful items, and use them in the right places to solve puzzles and progress through the story.
Every interaction matters, so pay attention to details and think logically to escape.

games.title: Escape From The Crypt
games.description: Escape from the crypt, one room after another, before the necromancers get you! They move faster than you do, but they won't avoid obstacles: trick them into dead ends!
games.howToPlayText: On PC, use the arrow keys to move your character. Backspace to undo a move, and H to get a hint. On mobile, use the on-screen D-pad and the on-screen buttons!

games.title: Stick New Year in Prison
games.description:
You will play as a Stickman character. Your character ended up behind bars in a prison cell on New Year's Eve. 
Your task is to find three successful ways to escape from prison. On Christmas Day, you will be presented with ten different items in a package that can be used to escape. In the game you will face a lot of problems that you will need to solve in order to get a taste of freedom. Various locations with a New Year's Eve theme will cheer you up.
games.howToPlayText:
Use a computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, then use a stylus or a finger.
To complete the game, you need to click on different objects and find successful ways to escape from prison.

games.title: Mike Lost In Desert - Hidden Object
games.description:
Mike Lost in Desert – Hidden Object

After a sudden engine failure, Mike was forced to make an emergency landing in the middle of an endless desert. His plane is destroyed, his supplies are running out, and dangerous bandits are on his trail.

Wandering under the burning sun, Mike must search for useful items, explore mysterious ruins, and survive against all odds. Each discovery brings him one step closer to salvation or to his doom.

Will he find civilization before the desert claims his life, or will the bandits reach him first?

Features:
Find hidden objects in beautifully hand-painted desert locations.
Follow a story of survival and determination.
Immerse yourself in the calm but tense atmosphere of the desert.

Can you help Mike survive the unforgiving sands and find his way back to safety?
games.howToPlayText:
You have about 8 minutes to make your escape through five desert locations.
In each location, you must find 10 hidden objects before moving on to the next area.

If the time runs out, the bandits will catch you.
If you manage to find all the objects in all five locations before the time ends, you will escape the desert and survive.

Search carefully, stay focused, and move quickly. Your life depends on it.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/mike-lost-in-desert--hidden-object?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: The Road Home: Granny Escape
games.description:
The Road Home: Granny Escape is a terrifying 3D horror survival game where your only goal is to escape a haunted house filled with danger, puzzles, and fear. You're not here by accident — Granny and Grandpa brought you here on purpose, and they won’t let you go easily.

🕯 The Story
Your trip home took a dark turn. While riding a bus through a remote forest, a massive tree crashed down onto the road. You stepped out to investigate… and everything went black.

You wake up in a locked, eerie house. The windows are boarded up. The doors are sealed. And something is watching you. You soon realize the terrifying truth: you’ve been kidnapped and trapped by an evil Granny and her mad husband.

This isn’t just a place — it’s a prison designed to break you.

🎯 What You Must Do
-Explore the dark and haunted house
-Solve puzzles and unlock secret passages
-Craft useful items from the resources you find
-Avoid Granny and Grandpa — they can hear your every move
-Survive deadly traps and unpredictable chases
-Make your way to freedom before it’s too late

⚙️ Game Features
-A chilling 3D horror experience with immersive atmosphere
-Evil and intelligent enemies who react to sound and movement
-Multiple escape paths and secret endings
-A full crafting system: collect, combine, survive
-Puzzles, keys, locked rooms, and hidden objects
-A heavy dose of mental horror and psychological tension
-Every sound matters. Every choice counts.

❗️ Not Just a Game — A Nightmare
This isn’t just a scary house — it’s a living nightmare. There’s evil in the walls, and death behind every corner. Will you outsmart your captors, or will fear consume you?

Use your brain, stay quiet, and find your way out… if you still can.

Download The Road Home: Granny Escape — and see if you have what it takes to survive the fear, escape the madness, and get back home.
games.howToPlayText:
WASD — Move
C — Crouch
Space — Jump

The main goal is to escape from the old people's house. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.

games.title: School Escape Obby
games.description:
Dive into the thrilling world of School Escape Obby — a vibrant online game in roblox style with stunning graphics and diverse locations!
Tackle unique challenges in each zone, from school corridors to mysterious dungeons. Customize your character with hundreds of stylish skins and compete with friends in multiplayer mode. Every obstacle tests your agility and wit: jump, dodge, and solve puzzles to escape the school! Perfect for all skill levels, the game combines fast-paced platforming with creative level design. Regular updates, eye-catching visuals, and competitive leaderboards make this game a top choice for fans of obstacle courses. Join millions of players worldwide and prove your skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Escape from school, play for time

Controls on PC:

Shift - show cursor
WASD - move.
Space - jump.
TAB - pause.
F - push enemy
E - interact with objects (you can also interact with them by clicking the mouse)

On phones: on-screen controls

games.title: Detective Max Mystery: The Disappearance of Mr. Winters
games.description:
Game description:

🔎 Become a detective in a new adventure story based game! 🔍

This part of Detective Max Mystery series is called “THE DISAPPEARANCE OF MR.WINTERS”.

Detective Max has received a curious postcard from his neighbour, Benedict Winters. In that note he tells that he moved in a hurry and does not plan on returning. He then asks to find a small mystery box he had lost.

🔎 Escape room + classic detective genre = sounds like fun! 🔍


ESCAPE ROOM DETECTIVE GAMES

—Use forensic science and the power of your grey sells
—Examine the crime scene
—Collect case evidence
—Identify the suspects, their motive and alibi
—Escape the room by solving mind-boggling puzzles and riddles
—Enjoy good story based detective games
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:

Where did detective Max's neighbour, Mr. Winters, go? Explore his apartment in search of evidence and the mysterious box.

🔍 Point and click the areas of the screen you want to investigate.

🧩 Solve puzzles by clicking and dragging objects.

👆Use the stuff you picked up and placed in the inventory.

💡Use a little hint if you got stuck.

games.title: Fruitsland: Escape from the Amusement Park
games.description:
Welcome to Fruitsland – a unique amusement park where fun awaits at every turn! Colorful carousels, exciting rides, and entertainers dressed as fruits – apples, bananas, watermelons, and oranges – fill the park. Children’s laughter fills the air, as school groups with teachers and families with kids flock to enjoy the day. Everything seems perfect, but not all is as it seems... One careless step, and you fall through an old hatch, landing in a spooky, long-abandoned part of the park hidden underground.

Before you lies a chilling, forgotten underground park where strange scientific experiments were once conducted. Only remnants of these experiments remain now, with crumbling rides and deserted game rooms that carry no joy. An eerie silence surrounds you, broken only by the sounds of old machinery and the shuffling of mysterious creatures. The first location is themed around apples – at first, it seems harmless, but soon you realize you’re trapped. As you study the remnants of the scientists’ journals, you uncover their plans to bring fruit to life, fruit that would entertain visitors around the clock. The sinister plan of the park’s owner aimed to turn fruits into real entertainers, capable of anything to amuse guests.

Your mission now is to escape from this underground horror. Every step brings new puzzles, challenging tasks, and deadly monsters that lurk around every corner, the results of failed experiments. Surviving here won’t be easy: these animated fruits have come to life, and now they’re hunting you. Every corner is a new survival test filled with horror, fear, and adrenaline. Choose your path wisely, solve puzzles to find your way out, and avoid deadly traps and monsters that only look like harmless fruits.

The first monster you will encounter is a blind apple, a nightmare resembling a zombie. It aimlessly roams the empty sections of the park, filling everyone who sees it with dread.

The second section is dedicated to the banana. This is the second colorful monster brought to life by horrifying experiments. Seeing it makes you feel as if something is invading your mind.

The third section of the underground park is dedicated to the Pomegranate — a sinister fruit with two large eyes. These roaming eyes not only track unwelcome guests but also attack them. They emerge from their sockets and move independently, chasing their target across the area.

Can you escape from this park and see the sunlight again? Will you find a way to break free from the gloomy underground? This horror game is for those ready for survival, monster hunts, immersion in fear, and adrenaline! Complete quests, solve puzzles, defeat monsters, and find freedom while uncovering the mysteries of Fruitsland.

Download this game to dive into the fruit garden… if you dare!
games.howToPlayText:
WASD - Move
C - Crouch
Space - Jump

The main goal is to escape the park by solving puzzles. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/fruitsland-escape-from-the-amusement-park?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Escape from School 3D
games.description:
🏃‍♂️ Welcome to Escape from School 3D – the ultimate blox-style school escape game full of chaos, action, and fun! Trapped in a crazy high school, you must fight your way through evil teachers, bullies, principals, and headmasters to break free.

💥 Armed with anything you can find—baseball bats, bricks, slingshots, and more—it's up to you to survive the madness and make your daring escape!

🎮 Game Features:

• Action-packed school escape gameplay with hilarious chaos
• Dodge and fight angry teachers, bullies, and bosses
• Use funny and destructive weapons: bricks, bats, and more!
• Cartoony, blox-style graphics and smooth controls
• Explore multiple school zones: classrooms, hallways, gyms, and rooftops!
• Fast-paced and addictive gameplay with survival elements
• Easy to pick up, hard to put down – perfect for all ages!
games.howToPlayText:
On PC:
Use the WASD keys on keyboard to control the character, and the left mouse button for the weapon.

On mobile:
Use the virtual joystick to control the character.

Look for the elevator on the level to go through it. Collect money to buy new escape heroes.

games.title: Car Escape
games.description:
Car Escape - an exhilarating and thrilling traffic escape game that prepares you for every pulse-pounding adventure. Every step counts, and every action can spell the difference between freedom and gridlock. Can you maneuver your car out of the traffic jam and break free?

Start the engine, press the accelerator, and prepare to escape the chaotic and congested streets. But don't be afraid; with your quick reflexes and sharp intellect, you'll soon master the art of navigating through traffic.
games.howToPlayText:
Navigate through the traffic escape scenarios and assess whether each vehicle's path is clear based on the arrows displayed. Find the optimal route for each vehicle.
- Tap the car gently to move it in the direction indicated by the arrow. Guide each vehicle to flee the congested area.
- Strategically select the order of vehicle movements to avoid collisions with other vehicles on the route. Carefully plan the sequence of vehicles to ensure smooth and seamless traffic flow.
﻿

games.title: Raven Estate
games.description: Raven Estate is a fast-paced shoot-'em-up where you become a fearless crow reclaiming a haunted estate. Blast through waves of monsters with strategically placed weapons that lock in the direction you pick them up. Every choice matters as you dodge, weave, and unleash chaos in this intense bullet-hell adventure. Can you reclaim your home?
games.howToPlayText:
Controls
- Use arrow keys or WASD to move and navigate the menus
- Hold Space to confirm options in the menus

games.title: Room 45
games.description:
You're trapped in Room 45—and it's watching you.
There are no instructions, no tutorials. Just you, a locked door, and a growing sense that something isn’t right. Solve twisted puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and piece together what happened here… before time runs out.

Every object might be a clue. Every second counts.
Can you escape Room 45? Or will it remember you?
games.howToPlayText:
E - INTERACT ( you can also interact with left mouse )
X - CLOSE
C - CROUCH

games.title: A Block Too Many
games.description: Build a tower, reach the stars! In this challenging and addictive block-stacking game, you play as an alien trying to escape a mysterious planet. Strategic stacking is key: each block has unique properties, and one mistake can make your tower collapse. Unlock new levels, blocks and customizations as you play. Choose between a challange mode to unlock levels Or compete for the largest tower in endless mode. Wana chillout there is even a sandbox mode to build into the stars.
games.howToPlayText:
Either with the onscreen controle for mobile, or the keyboard on PC, you controle your ship to decide where to stack blocks.  You need to get to a sertain hight to escape the planet. 

Get stars as rewards. Then use those stars to buy skins or temporary updates like see what the next block will be or more ship speed.

games.title: 12 minutes to survive
games.description:
Step into the shoes of a powerful mage in 12 Minutes to Survive, an intense survival game where every second counts! Battle against relentless waves of enemies for 12 action-packed minutes. Level up your character mid-battle to unlock powerful skills and abilities, and collect souls from defeated foes to upgrade your mage’s power.

With each passing moment, the challenge escalates—will your strategic choices and magical prowess be enough to conquer the chaos? Prove your mastery of the arcane and survive the onslaught!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop -> Move with the arrow keyboard keys
Mobile -> Use the touch virtual button on screen to move

games.title: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway
games.description: Schoolboy Escape: Runaway is a stealth-based adventure where you help a determined kid outsmart strict parents and break free from his locked home. Navigate shadowy halls, avoid detection, and use clever tricks to carry out your great escape. You’ve made a promise—now it’s up to you to keep it and reach your friends outside.FeaturesStealth mode: Hide, sneak, and avoid meeting your parents.Horror atmosphere: Beware of every unexpected sound, creak and rustle, peer into the dark corridors of the old house.Interactive house: Explore every corner of the house, and become a real detective.Realistic sounds: Listen to footsteps and rustles to predict the movements of parents.
games.howToPlayText: ControlsDesktop ControlsWASD = movementMouse = camera rotationLMB = interactionR = hintP = pauseMobile ControlsJoystick = movementScreen Swipes = camera rotationOn-screen buttons = interaction, pause, and prompt

games.title: Prisoners Run
games.description: A brutal prison where guards show no mercy. You play as a powerful inmate who can smash doors, outsmart guards, and free fellow prisoners while fighting your way to escape.
games.howToPlayText: Game Objective: Find the key and reach the exit elevator to advance to the next level. Rescue and escort fellow prisoners to freedom along the way. Desktop Controls: Arrows or WASD. Mobile Controls: virtual Joystick: Drag to move in all directions.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/prisoners-run?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Schoolboy Runaway: room escape
games.description:
Skuf dad won't let you go for a walk, can you escape room? Make first stealth room escape! Schoolboy kid wants to runaway, not learn lessons, so go escape room!

"Schoolboy Runaway: room escape" is an exciting 3D first-person quest where you are a schoolboy kid and strict parents do not let you go outside.

👨👩‍🦱 Dad and mom are constantly giving you tasks, like cleaning toys or washing the floor, but schoolboy patience is running out! It's time to search hidden objects in house and escape room! 🏃‍♂️

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Please write your questions and ideas for new levels!
games.howToPlayText:
💻 PC:
WASD - Walk
Mouse - Camera Rotation
Left mouse button - Interaction

📲 Phone:
Joystick in the left half of the screen - Walk
Swipe in the right half of the screen - Camera rotation
Click on objects - Interaction

games.title: Daddy Escape
games.description: Try your skills with Daddy Escape, a free online game where you solve challenging puzzles. Help Daddy avoid traps and threats like monsters and bombs to achieve a safe getaway. Test your abilities and see if you can secure his escape!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/daddy-escape?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: The Escape Series
games.description: The Escape Series is an intriguing game that tests your intellect and analytical abilities. Explore detailed environments for clues and objects to aid your escape. Each space features distinct puzzles and riddles to overcome, ensuring a captivating experience on both mobile and desktop platforms.
games.howToPlayText: Use the mouse to select and interact with objects, solve the codes and find a way out of the room using logic and solving puzzles

games.title: Geek Escape: Run for Survival
games.description: Geek Escape: Run for Survival is an exciting arcade game where players control a nerdy hero racing against bullies. Available for free online on various platforms, it combines action and strategy. Players dodge obstacles and use trash cans as weapons in this thrilling adventure filled with excitement.
games.howToPlayText:
Arrow keys to navigate
Spacebar to throw trash cans
Shift key for speed boost
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/geek-escape-run-for-survival?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Creepy playtime
games.description: Enter the unsettling realm of Creepy Playtime, where shadows hide lurking threats. Collect soda cans while avoiding detection in this suspenseful game. A haunting voice taunts your every step. Can you escape the monsters, or will they ensnare you? Play this frightening adventure for free online on PC and mobile.
games.howToPlayText:
You woke up backstage, filled with monsters and mysteries! The locals do not like uninvited guests, so its better not to get caught by them. To get out of the backstage, you need to collect soda cans scattered throughout the backstage. But be careful, the monsters behind the scenes are very vigilant! Can you get out? If not, then you will stay there forever!

Controls on PC:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space

Controls on smartphone:
Movement - Left joystick
Turns - Right joystick
Jump - Button
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/creepy-playtime?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Stick Doors and Island
games.description:
Stranded on a deserted island... or trapped in a locked room – what escape route will you choose?
In this escape game, you're given multiple options to break free – but not all of them will lead to success. Some are clever, some are risky, and others... might just lead to failure.

Find all the successful ways to escape – whether you're solving puzzles in a room or surviving on an island.
Test your logic, think outside the box, and uncover the one true path to freedom.

Will you make it out? Good luck – your escape begins now.
games.howToPlayText:
Find all the successful ways to escape from the rooms and the island.
Use your computer mouse to control the game.
If you have a mobile device, use a stylus or your finger.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/stick-doors-and-island?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: The Depth of the Limbo
games.description:
The game is about a girl in limbo who has to complete all the levels to wake up. Top view: The character must overcome 13 levels. Each level is a one—minute test cycle, but the camera rotates around the hero, changing the orientation of the space. Due to the moving camera, you can get confused about right, left, up and down, which turns simple routes into a puzzle.

The lines of the path seem familiar until they turn around your head, forcing you to rethink each goal. The goal is simple and touching: to complete the route from beginning to end, overcome the inner noise of fear, and wake up refreshed and free.
games.howToPlayText:
On the computer:
To make the character move to the right, left, up or down, press the D, A, W, S keys or the arrows to the right, left, up or down, respectively.

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character move to the right, left, up or down, press the arrow buttons to the right, left, up or down, respectively.
